summary.para: Describes the blend state for a render target.
summary.blockquote: [!NOTE] This structure is supported by the Direct3D 11.1 runtime, which is available on Windows 8 and later operating systems.
[!NOTE] It's not valid for LogicOpEnable and BlendEnable to both be TRUE.
[!NOTE] If you set LogicOpEnable to TRUE, then BlendEnable must be FALSE, and the system's option must be TRUE.

member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_BLEND_DESC1.SrcBlend
member.summary: This specifies the operation to perform on the RGB value that the pixel shader outputs. The BlendOp member defines how to combine the SrcBlend and DestBlend operations.

member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_BLEND_DESC1.DestBlend
member.summary: This specifies the operation to perform on the current RGB value in the render target. The BlendOp member defines how to combine the SrcBlend and DestBlend operations.

member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_BLEND_DESC1.BlendOp
member.summary: This defines how to combine the SrcBlend and DestBlend operations.

member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_BLEND_DESC1.SrcBlendAlpha
member.summary: This specifies the operation to perform on the alpha value that the pixel shader outputs. Blend options that end in _COLOR are not allowed. The BlendOpAlpha member defines how to combine the SrcBlendAlpha and DestBlendAlpha operations.

member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_BLEND_DESC1.DestBlendAlpha
member.summary: This specifies the operation to perform on the current alpha value in the render target. Blend options that end in _COLOR are not allowed. The BlendOpAlpha member defines how to combine the SrcBlendAlpha and DestBlendAlpha operations.

member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_BLEND_DESC1.BlendOpAlpha
member.summary: This defines how to combine the SrcBlendAlpha and DestBlendAlpha operations.

member.name: D3D11_RENDER_TARGET_BLEND_DESC1.LogicOp
member.summary: A -typed value that specifies the logical operation to configure for the render target.
